mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MARKET_REPLY ( REPLY_NO, MARKET_COMMENT_NO, USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MARKET_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{marketCommentNo}, #{userId}, #{replyContent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_NO AS replyNo, R.MARKET_COMMENT_NO AS marketCommentNo, R.USER_ID AS userId, R.REPLY_CONTENT AS replyContent, R.REPLY_DATE AS replyDate, U.USER_NAME AS userName FROM TB_MARKET_REPLY R JOIN TB_USER U ON R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE R.MARKET_COMMENT_NO = #{marketCommentNo} ORDER BY R.REPLY_DATE ASC
SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_MARKET_REPLY WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
